title: NFL Draft With Daniel Jeremiah, NBA Playoffs & Ben Simmons Dresses Like The Joker
description:
Football is back. But first we recap the weekend of basketball including Celtics whomping the Nets and Ben Simmons antics continue. (00:02:23-00:17:30) Jokic earns his MVP. Grayson Allen owns Big Cat. Embiid is hurt. The TWolves stay undefeated in protest games and more. (00:17:31-00:48:14) Who's back of the week including Scumbag Yankee fans and Baker Mayfield's statue. (00:49:07-01:05:39) Daniel Jeremiah joins the show to talk about the NFL Draft, how this class stacks up, how he ranks the QB's and some nuggets you can pass along to people you watch the draft with. (01:07:20-01:47:18) We finish with Billy Explains, as Billy breaks down the Elon Musk/Bill Gates feud.Â (01:48:08-02:00:39)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
